TEXT.TITLE: U.S. BUSINESS LOANS FALL 1.08 BILLION DLRS
TEXT.BODY: Business loans on the books of major U.S. banks, excluding acceptances, fell 1.08 billion dlrs to 276.37 billion dlrs in the week ended April 8, the Federal Reserve Board said. The Fed said that business loans including acceptances fell 1.1 billion dlrs to 278.67 billion dlrs. Reuter
